title: 560: I Don’t Like It When I’m Disappointed
description: Reliable features of voice-based virtual assistants, our hypothetical U.S. internet legislation, the impact of Apple's new Passwords app on our password management, and our comfort level with sharing intimate thoughts with an LLM.
author: Dan Moren and Mikah Sargent

#560: I Don’t Like It When I’m Disappointed

June 26th, 2024 · 29 minutes

Reliable features of voice-based virtual assistants, our hypothetical U.S. internet legislation, the impact of Apple's new Passwords app on our password management, and our comfort level with sharing intimate thoughts with an LLM.
